content.custom: Github for knitters

Knitting Pattern

R0 : k5
R1-3 : k2, m1, k until 2 sts remain, m1, k2
R4 : k2, m1, k1, m1, k until 3 sts remain,
     m1, k1, m1, k2

Repeat R1-4 for 10 times

Knitting Pattern

R0 : k5
R1-3 : k2, m1, k until 2 sts remain, m1, k2
R4 : k2, m1, k1, m1, k until 3 sts remain,
     m1, k1, m1, k2

Repeat R1-4 for 10 times

Knitting Pattern

R0 : k5
R1-3 : k2, m1, k until 2 sts remain, m1, k2
R4 : k2, m1, k1, m1, k until 3 sts remain,
     m1, k1, m1, k2

Repeat R1-4 for 10 times
